Die Vorsehung
programme.desc: Solace: Directed by Afonso Poyart. With Anthony Hopkins, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Abbie Cornish, Colin Farrell. Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script FBI Special Agent Joe Merriwether (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) is unable to solve a series of homicides, he decides to enlist the help of his former colleague Dr. John Clancy (Anthony Hopkins), a retired physician with psychic powers."},"datePublished":"2016-12-16","description":"Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.","keywords":"euthanasia,psychic,serial killer,clairvoyant,predicting the future","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1291570/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"davidgee"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Daft but gripping","reviewBody":"If this reminds you of SILENCE OF THE LAMBS, it's almost certainly meant to. Anthony Hopkins, in creepy (hammy!) near-Hannibal mode, plays a clairvoyant investigator helping the FBI track down a serial killer who - by credibility-stretching coincidence - also happens to be blessed with amazing psychic powers and has a seriously weird motive for his grisly crimes.\n\nSOLACE was originally pitched as a sequel to SE7EN, we're told, and had major production difficulties. There are echoes of almost all the Hannibal Lecter movies. Abbie Cornish's FBI agent never escapes from the shadow of Jodie Foster's Clarice Starling. Colin Farrell is, as ever, a charismatic presence, although he is playing a character the script does not make remotely believable. We see too many of Hopkins's 'visions' of how things may (or may not) be about to turn out. Nowhere near as grim and atmospheric as SE7EN, SOLACE is more than a little daft - but despite muddled direction it's still gripping and at least as watchable as a 'vintage' episode of CSI.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":58299,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: FBI
FBI
FBI: Special Crime Unit
programme.desc:
FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anti-American Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

investigation","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West","dateCreated":"2020-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anti-American Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, Barrett Foa, LL Cool J. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive","datePublished":"2005-09-22","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":167962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":167962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." investigation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anti-American Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
Denn zum Küssen sind sie da
programme.desc: Kiss the Girls: Directed by Gary Fleder. With Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Cary Elwes, Alex McArthur. Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119468/","name":"Kiss the Girls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2MWE1ZDYtNjNkYS00YjZmLWJkZjctOTYzYTVjMDFiN2M5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000171/","name":"Ashley Judd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000144/","name":"Cary Elwes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001219/","name":"Gary Fleder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666248/","name":"James Patterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0458318/","name":"David Klass"}],"datePublished":"1997-10-03","description":"Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.","keywords":"detective,kidnapping,escape,serial killer,tied to a tree","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"NewEnglandPat"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd","reviewBody":"This suspense thriller is every bit as good as James Patterson's fine novel and has great chemistry between Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd. The sole plot is Freeman's search for two serial kidnappers and killers who snatch beautiful and accomplished young women, including Freeman's niece. The two killers try to outdo each other as they seize and destroy their trophy captives. As with most mysteries, this one has the usual red herrings, false leads and dead ends. Freeman is excellent as Alex Cross and heroine Judd is a study in grit and survival and is very effective in a finely nuanced role. The supporting cast is also great in a movie that has a leisurely pace and several great action scenes as it peaks towards its conclusion. The North Carolina location lensing, music score and cinematography are all very good.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68114,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive","datePublished":"2005-09-22","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":167962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

Cook"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive","datePublished":"2005-09-22","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":167962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

Surf's Up – Könige der Wellen
programme.desc:
Surf's Up: Directed by Ash Brannon, Chris Buck. With Shia LaBeouf, Jeff Bridges, Zooey Deschanel, Jon Heder. A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick." data-id="main"/><script Rhymer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105169/","name":"Ash Brannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118333/","name":"Chris Buck"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Surf's Up","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2844197145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwNTYxNDAtNWI4ZC00YjRhLWEzZWUtNmM1ZDM5MzhiZDUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwNTYxNDAtNWI4ZC00YjRhLWEzZWUtNmM1ZDM5MzhiZDUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"datePublished":"2007-08-08","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.","keywords":"anthropomorphic penguin,movie flop,columbia tristar,anthropomorphic animal,anthropomorphism","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hellokristen"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hang 7","reviewBody":"It's not the funniest animated movie you've ever seen -- most of the jokes are amusing, rather than laugh-out-loud -- but it does the job.

Sometimes the humor just seems to be "it's penguins doing human things -- get it?" 

But it's fast-moving, colorful, and the voice cast is good. (Fortunately, they didn't give Jon Heder too much to do, so he wasn't out of his depth.) 

Shia LeBeouf was very good (esp. considering how young he is). Several of us thought it was Bruce Willis doing the character of Cody. Snappy and smart. I liked Mario Cantone as the snarky sandpiper.

The animation is so deft you can actually see subtle emotions play over the faces of these birds. The waves sometimes look real, not animation.

There's a lot of stuff about surfing. Seemed like one of those old surfing documentaries sometimes. I didn't know if the kids could follow all that -- but the 3 little girls sitting in front of me pronounced the movie "fantastic" afterwards, so I guess it did its job.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71264,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

Trailer from Columbia Pictures","datePublished":"2007-08-08","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.","keywords":"anthropomorphic penguin,movie flop,columbia tristar,anthropomorphic animal,anthropomorphism","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423294/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hellokristen","dateCreated":"2007-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hang 7","reviewBody":"It's not the funniest animated movie you've ever seen -- most of the jokes are amusing, rather than laugh-out-loud -- but it does the job.

Sometimes the humor just seems to be "it's penguins doing human things -- get it?" 

But it's fast-moving, colorful, and the voice cast is good. (Fortunately, they didn't give Jon Heder too much to do, so he wasn't out of his depth.) 

Shia LeBeouf was very good (esp. considering how young he is). Several of us thought it was Bruce Willis doing the character of Cody. Snappy and smart. I liked Mario Cantone as the snarky sandpiper.

The animation is so deft you can actually see subtle emotions play over the faces of these birds. The waves sometimes look real, not animation.

There's a lot of stuff about surfing. Seemed like one of those old surfing documentaries sometimes. I didn't know if the kids could follow all that -- but the 3 little girls sitting in front of me pronounced the movie "fantastic" afterwards, so I guess it did its job.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":71264,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"duration":"PT1H25M"</script><metacontent="

McNeice"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103911/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136637/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591286/","name":"Dominic Minghella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189596/","name":"Mark Crowdy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272401/","name":"Craig Ferguson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Doc Martin: Series 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2606414105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Doc Martin: Season 8","datePublished":"2004-09-02","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","keywords":"socially awkward man,doctor,opposites attract,fear of blood,rural setting","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"groggo","dateCreated":"2007-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Brits Know How to Do It","reviewBody":"Doc Martin is so unusual and wonderfully off-kilter that it becomes addictive within 20 minutes of exposure. 

The titular Doc is a guy who was probably a curmudgeon before puberty. He's a surgeon from sophisticated, worldly London who moves to (fictional) Portwenn on the coast of Cornwall because he suddenly becomes ill at the sight of blood. This is not a good omen for a surgeon. He quits to become a general practitioner and he's satisfied, thanks very much, with checkups, prescriptions and referrals.

The foul-mannered, blunt-spoken Doc smugly considers himself above the crowd, but he soon learns he is really BELOW the crowd, out of step with Portwenn's eccentricities, value systems and peculiar burghers, who make the mere lunatics of London look normal by comparison.

Martin Clunes is terrific in the lead role. He is a tall, charismatic and not exactly handsome actor who looks like he would be more comfortable playing cops and heavies. He is, instead, a consummate comic actor. His facial and physical comedy, his frequent bouts of exasperation and bewilderment, are things to behold. (Note: some wags have compared him to 'House,' from the popular TV drama of the same name. House is played by Hugh Laurie, another splendid Brit, and that's about where the comparison begins and ends. They are two very different characters in two very different shows.)

Portwenn's local population, with its twisted logic that somehow makes perfect sense, is represented through the tour-de-force acting of supporting players: Bert (Ian McNeice, who always dazzles playing offbeat, world-weary philosophical characters); Louise (the charming and beautiful Caroline Catz), who either loves Martin or wants to kill him; corn-rowed Elaine (lovely Lucy Punch) as the ditzy assistant with her own set of secretarial ethics; and Doc's Aunt Joan (the great Stephanie Cole, who has been delighting audiences since the 1960s).

Dominic Minghella, he of the Minghella mob of talented artists (brother Anthony directed 'The English Patient'), is the brains behind this brilliant controlled chaos.

Don't miss this program. TV shows that are both funny AND intelligent are the rarest of TV fare.

And a fast footnote: let us all bow our heads and pray that Hollywood doesn't try to remake this.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 100 Code
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 3: Conley (Dominic Monagahan) konnte den Täter fassen, doch der kündigt weitere Morde an. Als die Ermittler ein überlebendes Opfer vernimmt, wird klar, dass sie es mit einen Serientäter zu tun haben. 43 Min.USA/S/D 2014. Von Bobby Moresco, mit Michael Nyqvist, Dominic Monaghan, Felice Jankell.Ab 16 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: Show Me A Hero
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 1: Nick Wasicsko, neuer Bürgermeister von Yonkers, wird durch ein Urteil gezwungen, ein Sozialwohnungsprojekt durchzusetzen - gegen den Willen der Bürger. Eine zerstörerische Kontroverse beginnt. 54 Min.USA 2014. Von Paul Haggis, mit Oscar Isaac, Catherine Keener, Alfred Molina.Ab 0 Jahre.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: Show Me A Hero
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 2: Richter Sand verlangt, dass die 200 Einheiten bezahlbaren Wohnraums sofort gebaut werden. Ansonsten drohen Bußgelder, die das finanzielle Aus für die Stadt bedeuten würden. 57 Min.USA 2014. Von Paul Haggis, mit Oscar Isaac, Catherine Keener, Alfred Molina.Ab 6 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: Show Me A Hero
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 3: Bürgermeister Wasicsko gelingt es, im Stadtrat ein Gesetz zu beschließen, mit dem der Bau der neuen Häuser in East Yonkers beginnen kann. Der politische Schaden für ihn selbst ist dabei jedoch enorm. 56 Min.USA 2014. Von Paul Haggis, mit Oscar Isaac, Catherine Keener, Alfred Molina.Ab 6 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

Show Me a Hero

credits.actor: Oscar Isaac, Catherine Keener, Alfred Molina, James Belushi, Winona Ryder

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2492296, Title: Show Me a Hero, --- Description: Show Me a Hero: With Oscar Isaac, Carla Quevedo, Peter Riegert, Natalie Paul. Yonkers Mayor Nick Wasicsko takes office in 1987 and has to deal with the serious subject of the building of public housing in the white, middle class side of the town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2492296/","name":"Show Me a Hero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2YTdmZTUtNzNlZC00NDZjLTkzYzAtZmJhNTA3NThlYWIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1209966/","name":"Oscar Isaac","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3587952/","name":"Carla Quevedo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726200/","name":"Peter Riegert"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Justice Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1408938777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MDM4OTk1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDcyOTU0NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MDM4OTk1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDcyOTU0NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"First official trailer for Show Me A Hero, a new mini-series from HBO.","datePublished":"2015-08-16","description":"Yonkers Mayor Nick Wasicsko takes office in 1987 and has to deal with the serious subject of the building of public housing in the white, middle class side of the town.","keywords":"lawsuit,1980s,based on true story,workplace romance,public housing","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2492296/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity","dateCreated":"2015-08-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oscar Isaac is incredible in this restrained, effective and realistic drama","reviewBody":"Just amazing. It's rather understated and procedural many of the times (but nothing unsurprising if one has seen David Simon's TV series). What it does in the six hours is amazing though. Its character development is exquisite, and by the time it's over it feels like it was a run of an actual television series. Of course, it could only be this long, but that doesn't stop me from wishing it WAS a longer series. Oscar Isaac is an amazing actor. I've said it before and I'll say it again, he's doing things not many actors right now are (or even can). The amount of raw talent he has, as well as the amount of warmth he can convey is staggering. That's what makes the end of the series so heartbreaking. I really hope this wins the Miniseries Emmy next year, and that Isaac also takes home the trophy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9990,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The University of Sing Sing
programme.desc: Über 2000 Straftäter verbüßen im US-Gefängnis Sing Sing lange Freiheitsstrafen. Doch der Knast nahe New York bietet den Häftlingen eine zweite Chance: Dank einer privaten Stiftung können die Insassen Collegekurse besuchen und Abschlüsse erwerben. Viele arbeiten mit unbändiger Energie und unter widrigen Bedingungen. Mit Erfolg: Viele Studenten kehren als verwandelte Menschen in die Freiheit zurück. - Tiefer Einblick in eines der berüchtigtsten US-Gefängnisse und eine inspirierende Geschichte über die Macht der Bildung. 39 Min.USA 2011. Von Tim Skousen.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Nachrichten
Dokumentation

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 1: Start der spektakulären Fantasy-Serie nach der Bestseller-Reihe: Das Leben der jungen Waise Lyra wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als ihr Onkel nach langer Zeit aus dem Norden zurückkehrt. 55 Min.USA 2019. Von Tom Hooper, mit Dafne Keen, James McAvoy, Helen McCrory.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 2: Die junge Waise Lyra beginnt in London ein neues Leben. Sie setzt alles daran mit Hilfe der glamourösen, aber undurchschaubaren Mrs. Coulter ihren vermissten Freund Roger zu finden. 56 Min.USA 2019. Von Tom Hooper, mit Dafne Keen, Ruth Wilson, James McAvoy.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 3: Nach ihrer Entführung lernt Lyra eine neue Gruppe kennen und bekommt unerwartete Hilfe. Es fällt ihr allerdings nicht leicht, zu entscheiden, wem sie wirklich vertrauen kann. 55 Min.USA 2019. Von Dawn Shadforth, mit Cristela Alonzo, Frank Bourke, Kit Connor.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 4: Lyra und die Gypter erreichen den Norden. Der Hexenkonsul rät ihr, sich den Panzerbären Iorek zu Hilfe zu holen. Dabei lernt sie auch dessen Freund, den Aeronauten Lee Scoresby kennen. 57 Min.USA 2019. Von Otto Bathurst , mit Frank Bourke, Omid Djalili, Ruta Gedmintas.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 5: Der Alethiometer führt Lyra und Iorek in ein Fischerdorf. Dort machen sie eine schockierende Entdeckung. Doch die erweist sich als wichtige Spur auf ihrer Suche nach Roger und den vermissten Kindern. 56 Min.USA 2019. Von Otto Bathurst , mit Kit Connor, Robert Emms, Ruta Gedmintas.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 6: Lyra ist mit den anderen entführten Kindern in Bolvangar gefangen und erfährt, welch schreckliches Schicksal ihnen blüht. Sie nimmt ihren ganzen Mut und Scharfsinn zusammen, um alle zu befreien. 53 Min.USA 2019. Von Euros Lyn, mit Dafne Keen, Cristela Alonzo, Kit Connor.Ab 16 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 7: Lyra hat den Absturz überlebt. Doch sie wird von den Panzerbären gefangen genommen. Mit einer List versucht sie Iofur, den König der Panzerbären, auszuschalten. 55 Min.USA 2019. Von Jamie Childs, mit Asheq Akhtar, Cristela Alonzo, Frank Bourke.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: His Dark Materials
programme.desc: 1. Staffel, Folge 8: Staffelfinale: Als das Magisterium immer näherkommt, lernt Lyra mehr über den von Asriel angeführten Aufstand. Doch für ihre Unterstützung muss sie einen hohen Preis bezahlen. 56 Min.USA 2019. Von Jamie Childs, mit Dafne Keen, Kit Connor, Frank Bourke.Ab 12 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

programme.title: Mayans M.C.
programme.desc: 3. Staffel, Folge 9: Nach den beunruhigenden Entdeckungen keimen in Miguel Rachegefühle. Er will Vergeltung für seine tote Mutter. Die Mayans begrüßen unterdessen ein neues Mitglied in ihren Reihen. 63 Min.USA 2021. Von Elgin James, mit J.D. Pardo, Clayton Cardenas, Sarah Bolger.Ab 16 Jahren.
programme.category: Melodrama

credits.actor: JD Pardo, Clayton Cardenas, Sarah Bolger, Michael Irby, Carla Baratta

programme.title: Strike Back
Strike Back
Strike Back
programme.desc:
Strike Back: With Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Michelle Lukes, Daniel MacPherson. Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934618/","name":"Philip Winchester"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495675/","name":"Michelle Lukes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042496/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi209365273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a teaser for the Cinemax limited series "Strike Back: Origins"."},"datePublished":"2010-05-05","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,sex scene,assassination","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"journalist1"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"24 On Steroids","reviewBody":"There is no show or film that has bought this level of war-fighting realism to the screen. It seems that Strike Back through the author Chris Ryan was able to retain the services of real SAS and SBS instructors, something that is a first and omg does it show. Combine that with dedicated really talented actors which again is unheard of, usually your typical action star has the acting range of a brick yet the casting agency has really pulled off a winner. And what about locations? INCREDIBLE, the British intelligence teams operate all over the world in some of the most beautiful areas of the planet.

This show has all the class of James Bond and the barrel-end of SAS-level military realism, America could learn some real lessons from this show.

The Brits could dominate TV if they invested in more shows like this.

This is Bravo Two Zero.....out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29804,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:

Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934618/","name":"Philip Winchester","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495675/","name":"Michelle Lukes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042496/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi209365273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a teaser for the Cinemax limited series "Strike Back: Origins".","datePublished":"2010-05-05","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,sex scene,assassination","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"journalist1","dateCreated":"2013-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"24 On Steroids","reviewBody":"There is no show or film that has bought this level of war-fighting realism to the screen. It seems that Strike Back through the author Chris Ryan was able to retain the services of real SAS and SBS instructors, something that is a first and omg does it show. Combine that with dedicated really talented actors which again is unheard of, usually your typical action star has the acting range of a brick yet the casting agency has really pulled off a winner. And what about locations? INCREDIBLE, the British intelligence teams operate all over the world in some of the most beautiful areas of the planet.

This show has all the class of James Bond and the barrel-end of SAS-level military realism, America could learn some real lessons from this show.

The Brits could dominate TV if they invested in more shows like this.

This is Bravo Two Zero.....out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29804,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2</script><metacontent="

A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,sex scene,assassination","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"journalist1","dateCreated":"2013-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"24 On Steroids","reviewBody":"There is no show or film that has bought this level of war-fighting realism to the screen. It seems that Strike Back through the author Chris Ryan was able to retain the services of real SAS and SBS instructors, something that is a first and omg does it show. Combine that with dedicated really talented actors which again is unheard of, usually your typical action star has the acting range of a brick yet the casting agency has really pulled off a winner. And what about locations? INCREDIBLE, the British intelligence teams operate all over the world in some of the most beautiful areas of the planet.

This show has all the class of James Bond and the barrel-end of SAS-level military realism, America could learn some real lessons from this show.

The Brits could dominate TV if they invested in more shows like this.

This is Bravo Two Zero.....out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29804,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0348914, Title: Deadwood, --- Description: Deadwood: Created by David Milch. With Timothy Olyphant, Ian McShane, Molly Parker, Brad Dourif. A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0348914/","name":"Deadwood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJhMjUzMDYtNzc4MS00Nzk2LTkyMGQtN2M5NTczYTZmYmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU3MTc5OTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648249/","name":"Timothy Olyphant","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0574534/","name":"Ian McShane","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0662504/","name":"Molly Parker"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586965/","name":"David Milch"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Deadwood: The Complete First Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi698417433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRjMWI1Y2UtMzMxMS00MDI0LTg5YWItNGMzM2VmYzZiNzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRjMWI1Y2UtMzMxMS00MDI0LTg5YWItNGMzM2VmYzZiNzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","datePublished":"2004-03-21","description":"A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.","keywords":"saloon,profanity,violence,outlaw,greed","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0348914/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gogoschka-1","dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The old west brought back to life","reviewBody":"If you want to experience the – real – old west first hand, look no further; you'll find it in 'Deadwood'. There has never been a show or a film that came as close to showing what life must have been like in those lawless young towns that got built nearly over night wherever gold was found. A magnet for all kind of fortune seekers (gold diggers, whores, outlaws – but also settlers who were just hoping to build a better life), the town of Deadwood was notorious even by the standards of the time. In the show, this "cesspool of vice" is brought back to life with great attention to historical detail. You'll find no romanticised view of pioneers who lived and died by "the code of honour", but real people whose moral standards are – in most cases – murky at best. And the world they inhabit is a rough, dirty, violent place where only the fiercest – and the most cunning – survive. 

As far as the historical characters depicted in the show are concerned, the writers naturally had to take some liberties (after all, nobody knows exactly who said or did what at the time), but the depiction of the era and the historical background are very accurate. Yet this is not a history lesson; it's an immensely entertaining western-show blessed with some of the best writers and actors working in television and film today – and especially the cast of 'Deadwood' really can't get enough praise: there is not a single performance here that isn't excellent. Of course, the one who steals the show is Ian McShane. His Al Swearengen is one of the most morally complex and fun-to-watch characters I've ever seen (and he misses absolutely no opportunity to show you just what the first five letters in "SWEAR-engen" stand for). The power-struggles in Deadwood he is involved in – and since he wants to maintain his position at the top of the food-chain he's involved in all of them – are equalled in complexity and entertainment value only by those in top-notch shows like 'Game of Thrones', 'House of Cards' or 'Breaking Bad'. And the lengths Al is willing to go to achieve his goals secure him a place in the top ten of "all-time great bad-asses".

So my verdict: While certainly not for the easily offended or those who prefer a "sanitized version" of the old west, 'Deadwood' offers a fascinating look at a time we mostly know from myths and legends and gives us a chance to revisit those and see them from a different angle. Great, intelligent and informative entertainment. 9 stars out of 10.

Favorite TV-Shows reviewed: http://www.imdb.com/list/ls075552387/","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":97527,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6</script><metacontent="

A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0384766/","name":"Rome","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM4MmU1NWYtNzJjYy00YWFhLThjOGEtZmMxOGI1NzE0NGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571727/","name":"Kevin McKidd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829032/","name":"Ray Stevenson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908116/","name":"Polly Walker"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097248/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0375285/","name":"Bruno Heller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531973/","name":"William J. MacDonald","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0587518/","name":"John Milius"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rome: The Complete First Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2862875929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQwYTc4MjItZTA0OS00NjQ1LTk1MWMtMGQ0MjE0YTQ1YmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQwYTc4MjItZTA0OS00NjQ1LTk1MWMtMGQ0MjE0YTQ1YmQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video","datePublished":"2005-08-28","description":"A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.","keywords":"male nudity,uncircumcised penis,bad mother,political rival,female nudity","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0384766/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"J5iftY5iveXtreme","dateCreated":"2005-09-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"a feast for the eyes!","reviewBody":"HBO's "Rome" is perhaps one of the best historical TV shows there ever was and one of the best HBO has ever produced.

Set during the first century B.C., this TV show tells the tale of two Romans serving in the army, Lucius Vorenus and Titus Pollo. Vorenus in a strict, humorless and hard-working centurion, expecting his troops to obey him and is a loyal citizen of Rome. Pollo is muscular, carefree, party-loving, and womanizing, yet he is also a faithful, trustworthy friend, loyal companion, and overall lovable character. These two military men serve in Julius Caesar's army and live during a time of turmoil in Rome.

Originally planned as a TV miniseries, "Rome" has become an actual TV show. This TV show is mostly fictional, but it incorporates historical characters like Caesar, Pompey, Cato, Mark Anthony, and Atia, the most of Octavian, soon to become Rome's first emperor, Augustus. It is a time when the Roman Republic is corrupt, and high-ranking Romans like Julius Caesar and Pompey fight for power. The historical events in Rome are told thru the eyes of Vorenus and Pollo.

The script is intelligent and realistic, with some profanity, violence, and decadence. Unlike most portrayals of Rome, which tend to be clean and sanitize things, this is a graphic portrayal of Ancient Rome, complete with drunkards, brawlers, womanizers, prostitutes, adulterers, fornication, and loads of sexual acts. This TV series do not attempt to hide the dirty aspects of the Roman Empire. Rather, it is a honest depiction of the Empire, portraying its decadence and wickedness.

As for the production, one word - great! The sets are huge and realistic, with the viewer feeling as if he/she is in the middle of the scene. The costumes, too, are realistic and accurate. The sets, props, and costumes, etc. show signs of research. The actors and actresses did a great job, too, portraying their characters realistically.

Overall, this is a great series. I will be expecting more seasons of this.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7</script><metacontent="

Weiss"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Series Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi59490329","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTg4YzdjNTctNDg5Mi00ZmU1LTkzOWEtNmMyNDBjZjNhNTJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTg4YzdjNTctNDg5Mi00ZmU1LTkzOWEtNmMyNDBjZjNhNTJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"It’s time to return to Westeros.","datePublished":"2011-04-17","description":"Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.","keywords":"based on novel,dragon,politics,nudity,queen","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0944947/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"damianhlebec","dateCreated":"2019-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"SHAME that the show is not re-watchable anymore.","reviewBody":"It use to be my favorite show by far and i never thought that could change,but it did.Last(8)season i watched only once but all the seasons before that i have seen 3 times,except the season 7,which i saw twice.Thank god that i did,because now i won't watch the show again.You really mess it up with the last season.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1841486,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":9.2</script><metacontent="

A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzODk5N2UtYjE4ZC00YWM1LWJkMGYtYmY2NjNjMjIzZDRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","datePublished":"2001-06-03","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"plumberguy66","dateCreated":"2002-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Free Therapy","reviewBody":"As I was reading through the comments about Six Feet Under I was struck by how many people expressed how this series made them FEEL. And how many people admitted to tearing up or even crying while watching the show. I admit I have done the same.

From the very beginning no before that From the moment I heard that Six Feet Under was created by Alan Ball, I knew I would like this show. I figured how could the maker of American Beauty go wrong? Boy am I glad I figured that.

To some degree I can relate to all of the characters on the show. And that speaks volumes because all of the characters on the show are kinda messed up in the head. And that is what I think speaks to so many people. I mean before Donahue was the most popular show on TV, I don't think most Americans even knew the word dysfunctional' as applied to the family unit. Then it seemed a badge of honor to wear. And it was ok to go about telling people that you are from a dysfunctional family just to be in'. Now after all this time and openness about our dysfunction, we begin to see how very much alike we all are. And that I feel is one of the binding elements of the watchers to this program. We sit each week and watch, basically, a part of ourselves work through personal issues, prejudices and shortcomings. Not always pretty, not always successfully but always openly, to us, the viewers. For me, to watch these characters struggle through some of their problems (which usually make mine look like a day at the beach) and let us come along with them to learn about their weaknesses and fallibilities and humanness is a lot like therapy for me. And in the end it only costs the subscription rate for HBO (no, I don't work for them).

I have never been that attached to the boob-tube (my father's word for the television) before. I have never had a reason to be. The programs that where on never more that mildly held my attention until now. I HATE commercials, I think they speak down to the public. So now I have no excuses and for that I am grateful.

Bottom line: I'm looking forward to the next few sessions uhm I mean seasons. That's my take, what's yours?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124677,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7</script><metacontent="

For me, to watch these characters struggle through some of their problems (which usually make mine look like a day at the beach) and let us come along with them to learn about their weaknesses and fallibilities and humanness is a lot like therapy for me. A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3501074/","name":"Madam Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJiMTNiNDktZGM1ZS00NmU3LWFiNmQtNjc0ZjNlMTU5ZjAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004857/","name":"Tim Daly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706992/","name":"Erich Bergen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075256/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355329/","name":"Barbara Hall"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madam Secretary: Series Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153522201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer","datePublished":"2014-09-21","description":"A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.","keywords":"politician,secretary of state,chief of staff,political conflict,politics","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Kaliani","dateCreated":"2014-09-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Will wait and see","reviewBody":"Being from Europe and not really interested in the details of US politics, I watched the show simply as entertainment and did not take it too seriously. Too bad some people take it as propaganda, it's only a TV show...

I liked the pilot and it left a lot of room for character and storyline development. 

Seeing as there are far worst shows out there, I'm willing to give this one a chance and hope to be positively surprised. 

Also, I've been waiting for Téa Leoni to be back on TV and really enjoyed watching her in a role that is perfect for her.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20470,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6</script><metacontent="

conflict,politics","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dinaambroci","dateCreated":"2015-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"You need a consultant!!!!!!","reviewBody":"I have been watched regularly the TV show as I was interested how will evolve the plot of this story.I like that a woman is centered in all this political story and she is playing really good.She dedicates a hard time and effort for every decision she made and I believe her. She is a good actress, but you really have some issues and big problems with all scenes regarding a true reflection of Eastern Europe Diplomacy. You really need a consultant on these matter that would try to help you to inform somehow people in a proper way about all that situation that you are trying to describe in this TV show. You tent to exaggerate a lot and to create a wrong image of the habits and common law in these countries.Also try to select better that actors that speaks a foreign language, their Russian for example is too bad to make me believe that he/she really is a Russian minister or ambassador or president's wife. Maria's speech was awful, and her final scene from the episode was catastrophic! Guys, really, if you are doing something, try better or do not do at all. I really want to stay with you but it depends on your work!!!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20665,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 8453458, Title: Uspjeh, --- Description: Uspjeh: Created by Marjan Alcevski. With Uliks Fehmiu, Filip Mayer, Iva Mihalic, Ivana Roscic. Follows the intertwining stories of four strangers who are bound together by a violent event." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8453458/","name":"Uspjeh","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWEzYjdjMjYtYzA3OS00ZDQ4LWIwMTctZjNkYmYxYjMyNWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQxMDU2MDM@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270445/","name":"Uliks Fehmiu","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4422558/","name":"Filip Mayer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2574924/","name":"Iva Mihalic"],"creator":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2497693/","name":"Marjan Alcevski"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Teaser Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3542596121","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTgzNDdlMzAtM2Y3Ny00NjU0LWJiNjEtYzI4MWEyOTgxNzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTgzNDdlMzAtM2Y3Ny00NjU0LWJiNjEtYzI4MWEyOTgxNzMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows four complete strangers who are bound together irrevocably by a violent event. As the consequences of their actions start to infiltrate every aspect of their lives, these ordinary people, from diverse backgrounds, decide to fight back.","datePublished":"2019-01-06","description":"Follows the intertwining stories of four strangers who are bound together by a violent event.","keywords":"stranger","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8453458/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DimitrisPassas-TapTheLine","dateCreated":"2019-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A nice surprise from Croatia.","reviewBody":"This is a 6-part crime/thriller series set in Zagreb, the capital city of Croatia. The story begins when four individuals meet for the first time during an unfortunate incident which ends up with the death of a young man, son of a local kingpin who will do anything to avenge his offspring's untimely demise. The plot thickens when the young female police investigator enters the picture, determined to find the culprit(s) of this homicide.

The plot has enough twists and turns to keep the viewer glued on his seat while the photography of this show is simply exquisite. After finishing watching "Success" (original title: "Uspjeh") I wanted to visit Zagreb as soon as possible as the city is captured in such a wonderful way that convinces you to make this trip. The performances are exceptional, both the protagonists and the secondary characters are portrayed in a realistic and plausible manner, nothing like the cardboard good guys Vs Villains of the American productions.

Overall, "Success" is a more than successful addition to the year's best crime TV shows from Europe and it leaves you thirsty for more. I would like to check out more series from the countries of former Yugoslavia as I'm sure that I will find more diamonds like this one. Make sure not to miss it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2159,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Don Jon
Don Jon – Was Frauen wollen und Männer brauchen
programme.desc:
Don Jon: Directed by Joseph Gordon-Levitt. With Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Scarlett Johansson, Julianne Moore, Tony Danza. A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2229499/","name":"Don Jon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ZhY2IzMWQtMGU4MC00ODg2LThkNWMtNWMzYmM2OTc5ZDMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330687/","name":"Joseph Gordon-Levitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330687/","name":"Joseph Gordon-Levitt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0301807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0415835/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330687/","name":"Joseph Gordon-Levitt"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2483071257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1ODg1MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI5NjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1ODg1MDI1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI5NjkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a TV spot for Don Jon. A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love. "},"datePublished":"2013-09-27","description":"A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.","keywords":"sex,watching porn,pornography,husband wife relationship,pornography addict","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2229499/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bill_the_butcher7"},"dateCreated":"2014-01-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"'Don Jon' Puts Jersey Spin on Romantic Comedies","reviewBody":"New Jersey guy Jon (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) only cares about a few things in his life: his family, friends, church, and porn. After many one-night-stands, he finally decides to settle down with a "dime" named Barbara (Scarlett Johansson). But not even this relationship can compare to the happiness Jon has when alone with his pornography. When he realizes his porn may be too influential on him, he begins to change his lifestyle and beliefs with help from an older woman (Julianne Moore).

Stories of sex addiction aren't new, having been dealt with most recently in 2011's Shame, but Don Jon feels different. Jon loves porn; he says it many times in voice-over and is consistently shown getting up in the middle of the night to go watch porn after just having sex in real life. He doesn't see it as an addiction, saying "It's porn. It's not heroin," as his excuse. To show the media influence on sex, the film opens by crosscutting many sexualized commercials, film scenes, and television clips over the credits, while actual pornography clips are spliced throughout. But unlike Shame, which treats this topic in an intense, dramatic way, Jon keeps it light, funny, and tries to show how easy it is for someone to unknowingly fall into this addiction in today's sex- obsessed culture.

The film also tackles an exploration of today's relationships. Barbara's own "porn" is romantic Hollywood films that Jon hates. These films have influenced Barbara's ideas on dating (she yells at him to stop cleaning his apartment because it's not sexy) and enforced her beliefs that typical gender roles are the only means to a happy relationship. This film speaks truths about ideas young people may have about dating in today's culture, and while spinning these topics in a mostly comedic light, it is still interesting to consider how much media pertains to our understanding of the world.

Don Jon succeeds in most areas, and one large part is due to its cast. Tony Danza is really funny as Jon's father and Scarlett Johansson (and her hilarious Jersey accent) steals every scene she in. The film offers up a good amount of laughs, and the purposeful repetitive narrative works in showing Jon's changing lifestyle. Most of the film is so upbeat and fast that the last twenty minutes may feel like its dragging, but it can be considered necessary due to Jon's slowed-down new lifestyle.

The fact that this is the first film by writer-director Gordon-Levitt is extremely impressive. Don Jon flies at a mostly fast pace, has a fun cast, and gives a great commentary on sex, relationships, and addiction.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":231986,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="
